content.text:
Mr. McCONNELL. Mr. President, if there is no further business to come 
before the Senate, I ask unanimous consent that it stand adjourned 
under the previous order.
content.speaker: Mr. McCONNELL

content.text:
There being no objection, the Senate, at 5:48 p.m., adjourned until 
Monday, November 13, 2017, at 4 p.m.
content.speaker: The RECORDER

doc_title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL MONDAY, NOVEMBER 13, 2017, AT 4 P.M.
title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL MONDAY, NOVEMBER 13, 2017, AT 4 P.M.
